professional_summary: Experienced Programmer Analyst with expertise in analyzing business and system needs, formulating integration needs, and creating comprehensive documentation using SDLC methodology. Proficient in database design, RPLSQL code review, and providing technical support.

key_responsibilities: Worked with clients to analyze business and system needs.
ongoing customer support with weekly updates and documentation for the wireless project using SDLC methodology.
Designed Oracle databases for clinical trials processed in-house or contracted-out.
Interacted with graphics designers and other DBA teams to validate databases.
Performed RPLSQL Code Review of other DBA consistency checks.

work_experience.company: Loyola University Law Computing Center - Chicago, IL
key_responsibilities: and network troubleshooting to identify and diagnose problems.
Assisted with training and ongoing support on a variety of computer softwares and printers via phone and in person.
Documented all computer software issues and resolved them by the end of the day.
Coordinated with staff members on creating a database system that helped with the company's marketing campaign with mass mailings.
Assisted with data entries for the created databases and troubleshot software issues.
Provided ongoing help desk support internally and externally via phone and in person.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Business Administration in Information Systems and Systems Analysis and Design
